article.Heading: Car Stereo
article.BodyText: We supply and install car stereos and navigation from Pioneer, Kenwood and Alpine - and install pretty much any other manufacturer's equipment. We can also source just about any system. Let us know what you need.
article.ImageDescription: Double DIN radio showing driving directions on map

article.Heading: Car Alarms
article.BodyText: Make life harder for criminals - tighten your security with alarms from Mullstar. We can fit alarms, immobilisers and tracking systems to keep your car protected.

article.Heading: SmartTrak Cat 6
article.SubHeading: Our newest tracking product from Global Telemetrics
article.BodyText: We can now supply and install SmarTrack Protector Pro Global, supported by Global Telemetrics.
article.ImageDescription: Computer showing a map with location information

article.Heading: Bluetooth Integration
article.SubHeading: Drive safely with Parrot & Fiscon handsfree
article.BodyText: Drive safely. Don't risk getting 6 points on your licence and a £200 fine.Those points and that fine increase dramatically if you're driving an HGV or other large PSV type vehicle

article.Heading: Safety Camera Systems
article.BodyText: It's a requirement that HGVs are fitted with monitoring cameras to minimise vision blackspots, while incident recording systems can help with your accident claim if you are not at fault.You can get more info on some of these issues from the HSE website
article.ImageDescription: Graphic of large truck showing reversing radar field

article.Heading: Comfort Upgrades
article.SubHeading: Cruise Control, Electric Windows, Heated Seats and Parking Sensors
article.BodyText: We can bring your vehicle up to your spec with aftermarket add-ons.Mullstar can install the missing pieces to make your car a better place to be.
article.ImageDescription: Cruise controller mounted on steering column
